languages.text: "Восстановлю контроль. Освобожу заключенных, верну арестованные грузы торговцам. Подонков, которых поставила руководить Ее Светлость, заменю своими подонками. Позабочусь о тех секторах станции, что медленно подыхают в изоляции. И, конечно, вышлю к Лорд-инквизитору своего представителя, чтобы он сообщил ему новости и передал мою готовность к сотрудничеству".

"I'll regain my grip on the station. I'll free the prisoners and give the merchants back their impounded cargo. I'll replace the lowlifes Her Ladyship put in charge with my own lowlifes. I'll take care of those of the station's sectors that are slowly dying in isolation. And, of course, I'll send an envoy to the Lord Inquisitor to bring him the news and inform him of my willingness to cooperate."
languages.original_text: "Восстановлю контроль. Освобожу заключенных, верну арестованные грузы торговцам. Подонков, которых поставила руководить Ее Светлость, заменю своими подонками. Позабочусь о тех секторах станции, что медленно подыхают в изоляции. И, конечно, вышлю к Лорд-инквизитору своего представителя, чтобы он сообщил ему новости и передал мою готовность к сотрудничеству".

And, of course, I'll send an envoy to the Lord Inquisitor to bring him the news and inform him of my willingness to cooperate."

And, of course, I'll send an envoy to the Lord Inquisitor to bring him the news and inform him of my willingness to cooperate."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “我会夺回我的控制权。我会释放那些囚犯，把扣押的货物还给那些商人。我会用我自己的人来代替库尔达女士派来的人，我还会好好照顾那些由于隔离已经慢慢凋敝的区域。当然，我也会派遣特使，向大审判官大人致意，告诉他这个消息，向他传达我愿意合作的意愿。”
languages.original_text: "I'll regain my grip on the station. I'll free the prisoners and give the merchants back their impounded cargo. I'll replace the lowlifes Her Ladyship put in charge with my own lowlifes. I'll take care of those of the station's sectors that are slowly dying in isolation. And, of course, I'll send an envoy to the Lord Inquisitor to bring him the news and inform him of my willingness to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: “我会恢复我的控制权。我会释放那些囚犯，把扣押的货物还给那些商人。我会用我自己的人来代替库尔达女士派来的人，我还会好好照顾那些由于隔离，已经慢慢凋敝的区域。当然，我也会派遣特使，向审判长大人致意，告诉他这个消息，向他传达我愿意合作的意愿。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「私が、ステーションを奪う。捕虜を解放し、商人には押収された貨物を返す。女帝が配置した下衆達は、私の選んだ下衆達に変える。孤独で死にそうになっているステーションの者達の世話をする。そしてもちろん、ロード・インクィジターに使節を送り、速報を伝え、協力をする意思があることを伝えるのだ」
languages.original_text: "I'll regain my grip on the station. I'll free the prisoners and give the merchants back their impounded cargo. I'll replace the lowlifes Her Ladyship put in charge with my own lowlifes. I'll take care of those of the station's sectors that are slowly dying in isolation. And, of course, I'll send an envoy to the Lord Inquisitor to bring him the news and inform him of my willingness to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: 「私が、ステーションを奪う。捕虜を解放し、商人には押収された貨物を返す。女帝が配置した下衆達は、私の選んだ下衆達に変える。孤独で死にそうになっているステーションの者達の世話をする。そしてもちろん、ロード・インクィジターに使節を送り、速報を伝え、協力をする意思があることを伝えるのだ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Recuperaré el control de la estación. Liberaré a los prisioneros y le daré a los mercaderes su carga de vuelta. Sustituiré a los miserable que puso ella al mando por mis propios miserables. Me ocuparé de los sectores de la estación que están muriendo lentamente en aislamiento y, por supuesto, enviaré un emisario al Lord Inquisidor para darle la noticia e informarle de mi disposición a colaborar».
languages.original_text: "I'll regain my grip on the station. I'll free the prisoners and give the merchants back their impounded cargo. I'll replace the lowlifes Her Ladyship put in charge with my own lowlifes. I'll take care of those of the station's sectors that are slowly dying in isolation. And, of course, I'll send an envoy to the Lord Inquisitor to bring him the news and inform him of my willingness to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: «Restauraré el control. Liberaré a los prisioneros y le daré a los mercaderes su carga de vuelta. Sustituiré a los miserable que puso ella al mando por mis propios miserables. Me ocuparé de los sectores de la estación que están muriendo lentamente en aislamiento y, por supuesto, enviaré un emisario al Lord Inquisidor para darle la noticia e informarle de mi disposición a colaborar».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich werde die Station wieder unter meine Kontrolle bringen. Ich befreie die Gefangenen und gebe den Kaufleuten ihre beschlagnahmte Ware zurück. Ich ersetze die Gauner, die ihre Ladyschaft als Verwalter installiert hat, mit meinen eigenen Gaunern. Ich kümmere mich um die Sektoren der Station, die in der Isolation langsam sterben. Und natürlich schicke ich einen Gesandten zum Großinquisitor, um ihm von den Entwicklungen zu berichten und ihm meine Kooperationsbereitschaft zuzusichern."
languages.original_text: "I'll regain my grip on the station. I'll free the prisoners and give the merchants back their impounded cargo. I'll replace the lowlifes Her Ladyship put in charge with my own lowlifes. I'll take care of those of the station's sectors that are slowly dying in isolation. And, of course, I'll send an envoy to the Lord Inquisitor to bring him the news and inform him of my willingness to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: "Ich stelle die Kontrolle wieder her. Ich befreie die Gefangenen und gebe den Kaufleuten ihre beschlagnahmte Ware zurück. Ich ersetze die Gauner, die ihre Ladyschaft als Verwalter installiert hat, mit meinen eigenen Gaunern. Ich kümmere mich um die Sektoren der Station, die in der Isolation langsam sterben. Und natürlich schicke ich einen Gesandten zum Großinquisitor, um ihm von den Entwicklungen zu berichten und ihm meine Kooperationsbereitschaft zuzusichern."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Je vais reprendre le contrôle de la station. Je libérerai les prisonniers et rendrai aux marchands leurs cargaisons confisquées. Je remplacerai les crapules que Sa Seigneurie a nommées au pouvoir par mes propres crapules, je m'occuperai des secteurs isolés qui dépérissent peu à peu et, bien sûr, j'enverrai un messager au seigneur inquisiteur pour lui apprendre la nouvelle et l'informer de ma volonté de coopérer. »
languages.original_text: "I'll regain my grip on the station. I'll free the prisoners and give the merchants back their impounded cargo. I'll replace the lowlifes Her Ladyship put in charge with my own lowlifes. I'll take care of those of the station's sectors that are slowly dying in isolation. And, of course, I'll send an envoy to the Lord Inquisitor to bring him the news and inform him of my willingness to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais reprendre le contrôle de la station. Je libérerai les prisonniers et rendrai aux marchands leurs cargaisons confisquées. Je remplacerai les crapules que Sa Seigneurie a nommées au pouvoir par mes propres crapules, je m'occuperai des secteurs isolés qui dépérissent peu à peu et, bien sûr, j'enverrai un messager au seigneur inquisiteur pour lui apprendre la nouvelle et l'informer de ma volonté de coopérer. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "İstasyondaki konumumu geri kazanacağım. Mahkûmları serbest bırakacağım ve tüccarlara el konmuş kargolarını geri vereceğim. Leydi Hazretleri'nin yetkilendirdiği serserileri kendi serserilerimle değiştireceğim. İstasyonun izole hâlde kalıp yavaş yavaş ölen sektörleriyle ilgileneceğim. Bir de elbette Lord Engizisyoncu'ya elçi gönderip haberleri ileteceğim, iş birliği yapmaya gönüllü olduğum konusunda onu bilgilendireceğim."
languages.original_text: "I'll regain my grip on the station. I'll free the prisoners and give the merchants back their impounded cargo. I'll replace the lowlifes Her Ladyship put in charge with my own lowlifes. I'll take care of those of the station's sectors that are slowly dying in isolation. And, of course, I'll send an envoy to the Lord Inquisitor to bring him the news and inform him of my willingness to cooperate."

traits.locale_text: "İstasyondaki konumumu geri kazanacağım. Mahkûmları serbest bırakacağım ve tüccarlara el konmuş kargolarını geri vereceğim. Leydi Hazretleri'nin yetkilendirdiği serserileri kendi serserilerimle değiştireceğim. İstasyonun izole hâlde kalıp yavaş yavaş ölen sektörleriyle ilgileneceğim. Ve elbette Lord Engizisyoncu'ya bir elçi gönderip haberleri ileteceğim ve iş birliği yapmaya gönüllü olduğum konusunda onu bilgilendireceğim."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
